name: Cancersimulation
tagline: A C# simulation of tissue growth
body: ### Welcome to Cancer Simulation Homepage! Cancer Simulation is a highly-parametrized C# application for modeling cancerous tissue growth at cellular-level. This project was created as an honors capstone for UMass Amherst Computer Science ### Cell Behaviors division (mitosis) death (apoptosis) blood vessel travel (metastasis) blood vessel request (angiogenesis) movement ### Contributors Andrey Izotov -- Developer Hava Siegelmann -- Computational System Adviser Joe Jerry -- Biological System Adviser Youngmi Noon -- Gene Ontology Adviser ### Notes You'll need a Windows machine with Microsoft XNA Game Studio 4.0 and Microsoft Visual Studio Express installed to run this code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
